config.name: Dropbox for JoomlaXi Forms
config.description:
Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily.
This action can be utilized to move the uploaded files in your Dropbox account.
config.help:
File-Upload Field Name is name of the field given in html code for file upload.
Like in the example name of the file upload element is resume_file so you need to enter this name in this parameter.
This parameter is useful when you have multiple file upload elements and you want to upload only selected file.
If nothing mentioned in this parameter than all the uploaded files will be moved to your dropbox account.

Important : enctype="multipart/form-data" is required when you are using forms that have a file upload control.
